item.title: Webtoon Shares Soar on Disney Digital Comics Partnership Deal for Marvel, ‘Star Wars’ Content
item.description: Walt Disney has also agreed to acquire a 2 percent stake in the media company behind the mainstream embrace of webcomics.

item.title: Disney+, Atresmedia Strike Spain Content Deal
item.description: “This unprecedented agreement expands their audiences and catalogues and deepens a long-standing relationship between the two companies,” they said.
